name: Dad Duck
text:
2+ "Duck" Monsters + "Momma Duck"
If you Fusion Summon this card using both yours and your opponent's "Duck" monster it gains this effect: This card cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects. Once per turn : You can Special Summon a "Duck" monster from your GY but it’s destroyed at the End Phase. If a "Duck" monster is equipped to this card: When your opponent activates a card or effect, you can negate the activation, and if you do destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Dad Duck" once per turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon a "Duck" monster that was equipped to this card when it left the field.
